description: David Nichtern, student of Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche and Duncan's meditation teacher, rejoins the DTFH!  Click here to learn more about David's new book, Creativity, Spirituality & Making A Buck.  This episode is brought to you by Squarespace (use offer code: DUNCAN to save 10% on your first site). This episode is also brought to you by Feals (visit feals.com/duncan and get 50% off your first order).

show.description: A weekly salon-style supershow where comedian Duncan Trussell and guests explore the multiverse. See Duncan on the road! http://DuncanTrussell.com for dates & details.
